slot.name: Hull Plating
slot.description: The ship's external plating, affecting the hull's mass, cargo space, strength and stealth capabilities.

slot.name: Power Core
slot.description: The main fusion reactor that powers everything aboard the ship.

slot.name: Computer Core
slot.description: The semi-AI that controls all subsystems and manages ship handling.

slot.name: Warp Engine - Small
slot.description: The main engine that generates thrust by bending spacetime around the ship.

slot.name: Warp Engine - Medium
slot.description: The main engine that generates thrust by bending spacetime around the ship.

slot.name: Warp Engine - Large
slot.description: The main engine that generates thrust by bending spacetime around the ship.

slot.name: Jump Drive
slot.description: The warp redirection system that allows a ship to activate a jump tunnel.

slot.name: Ftr Jump Drive
slot.description: The warp redirection system that allows a ship to activate a jump tunnel. Fighters have miniaturized versions of the device, with far less fuel storage than regular small Jump Drives.

slot.name: Verniers Array - Small
slot.description: Thrusters scattered all around the hull to allow the ship to turn.

slot.name: Verniers Array - Medium
slot.description: Thrusters scattered all around the hull to allow the ship to turn.

slot.name: Verniers Array - Large
slot.description: Thrusters scattered all around the hull to allow the ship to turn.

slot.name: Shield Generator
slot.description: The generator that protects the ship from incoming damage.

slot.name: Ftr Shield Generator
slot.description: The generator that protects the ship from incoming damage.

slot.name: Core Systems Extension
slot.description: Core systems can be improved in a number of ways, enhancing a vessel's efficiency in specialized fields.

slot.name: Internal Holds
slot.description: Internal storage space, normally only used for payload, but often fitted with makeshift core extensions.

slot.name: Hardpoint
slot.description: External mount for various utility extensions, mostly active systems or payload containers.

slot.name: Containers Ring
slot.description: External mount for containers, arranged in circular rings.

slot.name: Swivel Gun
slot.description: External mount for swivel-mounted guns.

slot.name: Missiles Rack
slot.description: External mount for supporting missiles.

slot.name: Flak Turret
slot.description: Mount for a point-defense turret.

slot.name: Main Turret
slot.description: Mount for a main turret.

slot.name: Spinal Gun
slot.description: Cannon mount forming the ship's spine.

slot.name: Craft Bay
slot.description: Bay to hold a number of small auxiliary crafts, usually drones or fighters.

slot.name: systems
slot.description: This slot is used for dedicated core systems of the ship. Other subsystems rely on this system to manage them, and the bulk of the ship's power and shield generation also happens here.

slot.name: hull
slot.description: This slot is used for structural modifications to the ship's hull. This slot represents the base layer of armour plating, and also greatly affects mass, cargo space and available weapon slots.

slot.name: engines
slot.description: This slot is used for engines. Engines propel the ship, which is kind of important. Engines require energy from the core system to function.

slot.name: bio_systems
slot.description: This slot is used for the brain, the biological equivalent to Core Systems. The brain of an organism is responsible for managing the function of the rest of the organism and allocating energy reserves for the battery and shield.

slot.name: bio_hull
slot.description: This slot is used for the shell, the biological equivalent to Hull Modifications. The shell is the last line of defense for the organism, protecting critical organs from damage. It is also helps determine the organism's cargo space.

slot.name: bio_engines
slot.description: This slot is used for the fins, the biological equivalent to Engines. Fins propel the organism through space.

slot.name: bio_weapon
slot.description: In addition to standard weapons, this slot can be used for special organic weapons which can only be equipped to bioships. Organic weapons are generally similar to their synthetic counterparts, but more efficient, which is important to compensate for the reduced CPU capacity of the brain in comparison to synthetic constructs.
